background: Grew up as the cartographer in the Kadrius system, starting out with Admin-0, Athletics-0, Carouse-0, Drive-0,
education: Attended university on Kadrius.  learning Navigation-0, and Medic-1  Almost died in an accident on campus, left before graduating. Eventually received healing to strength, but incurred some debt
terms: Scientist (Researcher): Got Scientist basic training. Increased in rank to Researcher/1, gaining Investigate-1. Worked in a field laboratory.

Scientist (Researcher): Employer cancelled research.  Continued research with another pack of researchers, gained an enemy contact of the previous employer.  Gained another rank to Researcher/2.  In mustering out, gained +1 EDU, and 50,000cr, minus 22,500 to healing from university wounds
Merchant (Scrounger): Increased in rank to Scrounger 1, gaining mechanic skill.
